channel.title: Networking on Patrick Karanja
channel.description: Recent content in Networking on Patrick Karanja

item.title: sshd.service
item.description: SSH # To connect to a remote device using ssh.You need an ssh server started on the remote device. How do you ssh? # Two ways one is through a password the other is through an ssh key. Which one do you use? # If you are big on security definately the ssh key.Passwords lowkey come through if you are lazy. so ssh key; From the terminal type # ssh-keygen .
